title: 'Star Trek: Starfleet Academy': Paul Giamatti and Holly Hunter on beaming into the storied sci-fi franchise (interview)
description: 'It felt really warm and welcoming. It was a lovely atmosphere the whole time.'
content: 'It felt really warm and welcoming. It was a lovely atmosphere the whole time.'
